title: Siri Shortcuts: Massive iOS 12 update to Siri | Trusted Reviews
description: ![]()Likewise, after tapping an ‘Add to Siri’ button from an app like Kayak, userswill simply be able to request travel plans from Siri to quickly load theaddress of their hotel, for example.Apple says there are hundreds of pre-made Shortcuts within the app’s gallery,which users can easily add to their library.However, it’s simple to to create your own or add features to the templates,from all of the first- and third-party apps they already have installed uponyour phone. Within the Shortcut editor you’ll also be able to drag the orderaround to choose which actions take place first.The new Siri Shortcuts functionality will be available on iPhone,[iPad](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/ipad-2018),[HomePod](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/apple-homepod), [AppleTV](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/apple-tv-4k) and [AppleWatch](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/apple-watch-3).**Does this do enough to bring Siri in line with Amazon Alexa and GoogleAssistant? Drop us a line @TrustedReviews on Twitter.**
